title: Wars of Religion account, Heberle literate

content.prompt: The ability of someone of Herberle’s social status in seventeenth-century Germany to read and write was most likely the result of which of the following?

choices.label: The diffusion of Renaissance humanist ideas to areas outside Italy
The Protestant Reformation’s emphasis on individual study of the Bible
The establishment of mandatory systems of national education
The growth of representative forms of government as alternatives to absolutism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
